## Source: ossf-package-analysis (70a2927dbcf9676b01eb3c46edf603f768bbff1ff822a72f1309dd21b663a096)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'region-selector-content' @ 6.4.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
